name: core-webmail
description: Roundcube webmail configured with nginx and php-fpm

root_authorized_keys.description: SSH public key(s) for the root user

syslog_host.description: syslog server IP address and port seperated by colon

mail_auth_user.description: smtp username if authentication is required

mail_adminaddr.description: admin email address alias for all mails to root@localhost

product_name.description: name of your service (used to compose page titles)

support_url.description: URL where a user can get support for this Roundcube installation

skin_logo.description: custom image to display instead of the Roundcube logo

ip_check.description: check client IP in session authorization

imap_host.description: IMAP host(s) chosen to perform the log-in, ssl://imap.host.com

imap_port.description: TCP port used for IMAP connections

smtp_port.description: TCP port used for SMTP connections

nginx_ssl.description: ssl cert, key and CA for imaps and pop3s in pem format
